body.name: LOOYUAN Blue Condenser Recording Microphone 3.5mm Plug and Play PC Microphone, Broadcast Microphone for Computer Desktop Laptop MAC Windows Online Chatting Podcast Skype YouTube Game（Blue

features: ♬【3.5mm Plug and Play】- Easy to use,you can connect your phone or computer directly to a 3.5 mm jack with the cable. No additional converters needed, real plug and play.But if your headphone jack is not 3.5mm please add a converter into 3.5mm,then our micphone can be used to your device. 3.5mm cable compatible with most of devices such as PC, phone, Ipad, IOS and Android.

♬【MINI Condenser Microphone】- Notice: not fit for iPhone 7，Mac need connect the USB External Stereo Sound Adapter，The mic is specially designed for radio studios, dubbing, podcasting, recording, gaming, MSN, Skype and conference chatting. Compatibility is great, not only working on your PC, laptop or desktop system(fit for Mac,Windows 7,8,10, Vista, XP) , but also on your iPhone(not fit for iPhone 7), iPad and smartphone device. （Mac need connect the USB External Stereo Sound Adapter）

♬【Perfect Sound Quality】- The pickup mode minimize background noise, isolated from the main sound source.Capture the sound from sources that are directly in front of the mic.100% restore your voice without any distortion,enjoy original voice and giving you the superior sound possible out of your vocal performances

♬【Dual Layer Filter 】- Tabletop microphone mount comes with professional dual-layer acoustic filter to prevent from popping and improve vocal recording quality; adjustable distance between the mic and the filter.

♬【Foldable and Adjustable Tripod】-Ultra-compact design for maximum portability keeps irmly, you can fix the microphone on the desk with the mini flexible head which is 180 degree rotatable; Folding type can carry it to everywhere, small and light, suitable for travel use, perfect for Musical Instruments, Broadcasting, Podcasting, Interviews, Voice Recording, Video Conference, Singing, Online Chatting such as Facebook, MSN, Skype,Youtube.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Best Choice for Chatting/Skype/YouTube/Recording/Gaming/Podcasting/Singing/broadcasting for Mobile PC Computer Notebook Mac iPhone Ideal for Recording Profession MINI Condenser Microphone ensure that your voice are easy to understand. If you are looking for a mic for recording ,our Condenser Microphone is absolutely a best choice for you. Perfect for Singing Since it adopts the noise reduction technology,there is not too much ambient noise when recording singing.Wonderful distortion-free recording to protect the quality of your voice. Excellent for Gaming This condenser mic kit greatly meet you basic use of communicating in a online game.It allows you to streaming games streaming on Twitch or other video platform, letting other gamer/viewers to understand what your are saying more quickly,clearly, and easily.

Improve the Sound of Your Audio Projects to make your life more enjoyable with LOOYUAN professional condenser microphone! Great for Youtubers If you are just starting your own YouTube channel, you definitely need a affordable MIC to make video or record podcast. With this condenser MIC, you are able to do voice over, video commentary,screen-casting,etc. Wonderful for Podcasting With no software to install, simply plug it into any available 3.5mm port, select it as your input in your software settings, and you're ready to create your own audio. Convenient for Online Chatting It does a good job for basic internet conversation over a variety of online voice chatting service,including Skype,Google Hangouts,Discord,Wechat,QQ,MSN,etc.You can be clearly heard by your friends, family members.

Warm Notice 1. For Apple Macbook, you may need a usb sound card adapter (Not included) to make the microphone functions well. And you need to set it on the Macbook. 2. For Notebook/ laptop/ tablet/ smartphone with only one 3.5mm headphone & microphone port, if you want to output voice Via headphones, a Headset Mic Y Splitter Cable Adapter is needed (Included). The pink one connect microphone and green one connect headphones. If your device is a lightning port like iphone 7, 8, x, xs or newer models , you need to prepare a additional lightning to 3.5mm adapter(Not included). And please see the Instructions as below: Plug the Lightning to 3.5mm Adapter Cord into the phone, then plug the 3.5mm Y type cord into the lightning to 3.5mm adapter, and finally insert the microphone plug into the 3.5mm Y type cord (red cord) and insert headphone plug into the 3.5mm Y type cord( green cord).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 4, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars For the price, it's fantastic!
reviews.reviewText: For my specific use case at work, I needed an analog microphone. I use a noise cancelling adapter through Asus to suppress background noise, as my home environment is not quiet/ideal when working from home. Although I have a nice Blue-Yeti Microphone I use for gaming/streaming, I could not use the noise cancelling dongle with it. With working on a work PC, with extremely limited access to third party programs, using LG's noise cancelling software was not possible, so the solution for work required hardware that required no software support. I could have purchased an audio interface and converted the audio back into analog, but this would have been expensive in comparison, not to mention converting a signal from Analog-->Digital-->Analog-->Digital would have most assuredly caused poor quality. for $20, this worked with my existing hardware, sound quality is fine, and it was plug and play. Can't ask for more.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Microphone for Video Conferencing
reviews.reviewText: My work involves a lot of video meetings, and I must have tried 7 different microphones from Amazon and returned them due to picking up too much background noise. This mike works great if you are doing Skype or Zoom meetings, etc. The price is incredible for the sound quality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 14, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars is cheap good?
reviews.reviewText: ok i am going say a few thing i have a blue yeti mic so ik a little bit bout mics not a alot not saying i am an expert by any means but one of my dislikes the install section of the book useless i got more info from the picture of the box than the book one other dislike but this dislike will very from person to person i had to add a gain filter for the mic to pick up my voice but i have a low voice now to the like the install process was really easy after i figure out what i was doing the sound was really decent it kinda surprised me for $20 after adding a gain filter i have not tested on a mobile device bc i don't have an aux port the packaging was nice and neat gave a few extra parts forcase u break the bands cant complain bout the microphone to much but its a cheap but well made

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Cheap in both price and quality
reviews.reviewText: TL;DR - a complete waste of both your money AND your time! Poor connectivity, poor quality, poor sensitivity, poor documentation, bad deal all around.Details: There are so many things wrong with this microphone that it takes a while even to enumerate them. The sound quality is clearly inferior to the iPhone 6's built-in one. The set-up is very complicated and the manual is completely unhelpful. The advertised iPhone connectivity is a lie: modern iPhones do not support a wired 3.5mm connection, while this microphone does not connect to the older ones. After wasting money and time researching and buying adapters, I gave up on LOOYUAN's promised iPhone connection. The only device to which I managed to connect this, ahem, "product," was a laptop (the process was also not intuitive by any means) but then the sound volume and quality was terrible. I had to practically bite the microphone to get any competent response to my voice. Then there is also an annoying background ping (I first assumed this was somehow related to the location, but then I tested it out at several others and the ping remained). This very audible ping was as loud as my own voice.Conclusion: It is baffling how this microphone ended up with 4-star reviews. Amazon Basics has a much better and more serviceable microphone that costs only 10 dollars more. LOOYUAN needs to be paying you to buy this. Unless you have nothing to do with 30 dollars and half a day of your time and enjoy frustration, please do yourself a favor and NOT buy this, ahem, ... "microphone."

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great mic for those not looking to spend a lot
reviews.reviewText: Love this microphone! It's relatively small, so I'm not losing any valuable desk space. It's also doing a solid job at not picking up the sound of my walking pad that's under my desk, which is super important as I like to walk during meetings sometimes. It also just does a great job picking up my voice clearly when I'm in meetings, so I never sound distorted and I'm not relying on the crappy built-in mic in my webcam. I'd definitely recommend this to anyone looking to try out an external mic!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 27, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I have been using this microphone for almost a year now, the overall quality is not half bad for how cheap and simple it is made. I have not ran into any of the issues other people have claimed to have with this microphone yet, the only thing that I have noticed is when I plug into a new windows device I have to manually set the output volume to max because in windows its only set to like 20%, I also have to adjust the DB Volume a bit to better pick up my voice but that does not bother me as I only have to do that when I plug it into a new device it's not been plugged into before. I have had no one complain about how quiet I sound when using this microphone which is one thing my headset had an issue with, and no one has complained about it sounding like low quality either. The other complaint I have about this microphone is the cable length, when it was on the stand it came with and Infront of me the cable was not nearly long enough to go past my 2 monitors and into the back of my pc, the splitter also had 1 cable end that was slightly longer than the other end so when using 2 splitters just to extend the cable it was not as long as it could be, even with the 2 extensions I ended up making my own extension cable for the microphone just so I could use it with my boom arm as that will take away at least half the cable. Other than those few things it's been reliable for me I have not had any additional issues throughout the year, and I would recommend it to someone who needs a cheaper mic just to start out with.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worked right out of the box.
reviews.reviewText: I was really impressed with the shock mount it came with, and it mounted up to the boom I bought separately with ease. Compared to my 48v mic, the volume seems a bit weak, but it is not my primary recording mic. I bought this one to use for my podcast guest mic as an inexpensive start up option. The pop filter is great also. My podcast kit did not come with a pop filter, so I got a second one separately in the boom kit. I'm going to give it a good workout in November when I record five episodes in one day in a five episode series for You Tube. I'm hoping for the best.

reviews.reviewTitle: ONLY 3.5MM TRS MIC I COULD FIND FOR DSLR CAMERA
reviews.reviewText: This was the only desktop mic I could find that would plug and play with a Sony RX100 M7. It has the 3.5mm TRS connection. All other mics had a usb connection or a usb+3.5mm that you had to connect through the mic headphone jack, which created a frequency hiss. This one worked with no issues. Sound is good. Background sound is minimal for a condenser mic. Still looking for something higher quality, but if you want it for online use it is a very good mic. Plus you have no other options except lapel mics.

reviews.reviewTitle: good enough sound quality for gaming
reviews.reviewText: For the price, you're not getting an exceptional price, but you're getting great value for money and something more than good enough for gaming.
Plugged in properly, turned on, and the sound input was switched to the microphone. Still did nothing, it's a waste of money.

reviews.reviewTitle: Great deal. Must have if you’re on a budget
reviews.reviewText: The sound quality is wayy better than any standard mic that comes with headphones or your laptop/phone. Picks up a lot of noise though so if you want one with adjustable gain, go for something a bit more expensive. Other than that it works great.

reviews.reviewTitle: Sub par for a non-attached microphone
reviews.reviewText: I had higher expectations for the sound quality that came through. The audio gets muffled and seems to be about the average quality you'd find in headphones with a microphone attached to them. Wouldn't recommend for one person, works fine for a group doing discussions over software such as zoom.
